title: Structural Learning Experience Design for Creative Competency Development in K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core theories and experimental methodologies in science and engineering
context.additional_context: A creative problem-solving course utilizing VR simulations and digital collaboration tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute creative problem-solving strategies three or more times in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can quantitatively analyze their learning engagement and motivation levels via structured questionnaires and develop improvement plans.
Learners can achieve over 80% creative outcomes while performing teamwork-based projects in the science field.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
